subject: Simsonn Plus X clutch pedal squeaking
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Customer Support,

During the recent Black Friday sales, I purchased a set of Simsonn Plus X pedals from a seller on AliExpress<https://a.aliexpress.com/_EzGyucY>.

Unfortunately, the clutch pedal has been making a persistent and fairly loud squeaking noise. I attempted re-lubricating the shaft with PTFE dry spray as recommended in the manual, but the issue remains. It was quiet for the first 5-6 pedal presses and then the squeaking returned.

I have attached the purchase invoice and a recording of the noise.

How can I fix this?

Best regards,
Erik Ussin
